message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll get a lot of use out of it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe $150 would be a fair price for me to purchase it.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand that $150 is a fair price for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $165. I think this is a great compromise, and I'm confident you'll still get a lot of value out of it.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $155 for the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I'm still a bit hesitant to sell at $155, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $160. I think this is the best I can do, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Based on my budget constraints, I am comfortable offering $157 for the product.
